Pizza.name: Meat Pizza
Pizza.About: Delicious and protein-rich with bacon, sausage, beef, ham and pepperoni

Pizza.name: cheese Pizza
Pizza.About: Fisherman's Tuna Pizza bring you the dedicate taste of the ocean with tuna, crab sticks, onions, pineapples on top of Pesto sauce

Pizza.name: Seafood Pizza
Pizza.About: Black olives, fresh cherry tomatoes, mushrooms, pineapples, sweet corns, zucchini on top of Mozzarella cheese

Pizza.name: Beef Pizza
Pizza.About: Shrimps, squids, pineapples, crabsticks, onions on a bed of hot black pepper sauce and topped with Mozzarella cheese

Burger.name: Chicken Burger
Burger.About: With our Spicy Pepper Sauce topping the southern style fried chicken fillet on a toasted potato roll, this sandwich was made for those who like it crispy, juicy, tender and hot.

Burger.name: Steak Burger
Burger.About: Beef burger with a taste like no other. It contains no artificial flavors, preservatives or added colors from artificial sources.

Burger.name: Lamb Burger
Burger.About: Layered with two slices of melty American cheese, slivered onions and tangy pickles on a soft, fluffy sesame seed hamburger bun.

Burger.name: Cheese Burger
Burger.About: Our simple, classic cheeseburger begins with a 100% pure beef burger seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper.

Drink.name: Coca Cola
Drink.About: Coca-Cola® is a refreshing McDonald's soda option that complements all of your menu favorites.

Drink.name: Pepsi
Drink.About: The classic and refreshing fountain drink with a unique blend of 23 flavors

Drink.name: Sprite
Drink.About: Sprite® is a delicious lemon-lime fountain drink and is available in sizes extra small, small, medium, and large.

Drink.name: Sweet Tea
Drink.About: Sweet Tea is made from a briskly refreshing blend of orange pekoe and pekoe cut black tea, sweetened to perfection.
